title: Best of The Herd: 10/23/2018
itunes:title: Best of The Herd: 10/23/2018
description:
Colin thinks the Cowboys trading for Amari Cooper is all about finding out if Dak Prescott can be a franchise QB or not. He says the Lakers loss on Monday night was actually encouraging for the team moving forward. Plus, Super Bowl Champion Trent Dilfer tells Colin why he likes the trade the Cowboys made and why every big free agent that leaves the Patriots fails on their next team. Presented by Perky Jerky.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
